description: Proposed works: Erection of a single storey wraparound extension (rear); and the erection of a mansard style roof extension to create an additional storey.
decision_conditions: <p>The development shall not commence until details, including samples and detailed annotated plans of all materials to be used on the external surfaces of the approved extensions, have been submitted to the local planning authority and approved in writing. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, and shall be maintained as such thereafter.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory.</p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall provide two swift boxes close to the eaves of the mansard roof extension prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of biodiversity.</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
